Package com.pjv.Helpers

Class Clock

java.lang.Object
com.pjv.Helpers.Clock
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Clock extends Object implements Runnable
This class handles the game clock and timer functionality.

    • run

      public void run()
      The run method of the clock thread. It decreases the remaining time of the active player by one second at regular intervals and checks for timeout.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
